contest-event.event-date: May 1, 1971 D Midlands Area (Third Section) Midlands Area (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-third-section National Championship of Great Britain (Third Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas.
